about_the_game:
Build Your Town From a Ruin

As your city rivals, the appearance of the buildings will change—from thatched huts to grand mansions, from deserted place to thriving town. Try to use the unique ancient Oriental-style landscape to build up a staggering, prosperous, and lively paradise!

Peace Life with Diverse Residents

Recruit a variety of classes and different-looking residents! The characters you recruit will live in your city and take up different activities. As your city grows, you can recruit more people to join this city. Every day you'll see them strolling the streets, chatting with each other, or working hard. There are time and weather systems in the game, forming a dynamic cityscape!

Craft Equipment, Develop Trade

Trade with merchants for resources to upgrade your city! Residents with crafting abilities can create a wide variety of equipment. These armaments can be equipped for your residents to make it easier to defeat enemies when they explore, but also can be traded as commodities. Use earnings to upgrade your building and create a prosperous business center!

Vast Map, Free Exploration

Seamless maps are available for free exploration! Command your residents to explore the wild, gather resources, or fight for treasure. Train your residents, and lead them deeper into the mists to fight stronger enemies, spreading your name across the entire continent!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or Above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Revival and Exploration is an oriental simulation game. Decorate your town with diverse landscapes and buildings, recruit residents to live in, and build a thriving city! You can also lead armed residents on traveling to different landscapes such as grassland, desert, snow, and volcanoes.
